News.Title: Zydus Wellness Insider Trading Disclosure Filed
News.Summary: Zydus Wellness Limited disclosed acquisition of 1,000 equity shares by Mrs. Nidhi Punit Adhia for ₹3,89,590 through open market purchase on NSE under SEBI insider trading regulations.

News.Title: Zydus Wellness Reports Q3 Net Loss of 400M Rupees
News.Summary: Zydus Wellness posted a consolidated net loss of 400 million rupees in Q3, marking a significant decline from the 64 million rupees profit recorded in the same quarter last year.

News.Title: Zydus Wellness Board Meet on Feb 3 for Q3FY26 Results
News.Summary: Zydus Wellness Limited has scheduled its Board of Directors meeting for February 3, 2026, to approve Q3FY26 unaudited financial results for quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Zydus Wellness Gets Court Relief on ₹56.33 Cr GST Demand
News.Summary: Gujarat High Court grants ad-interim relief to Zydus Wellness subsidiary, restraining proceedings on GST demand of ₹56.33 crores related to pre-acquisition period fully indemnified by Heinz Italia.

News.Title: Zydus Wellness clarifies volume surge to BSE
News.Summary: Zydus Wellness Limited responds to BSE inquiry about significant volume increase in its equity shares, stating no undisclosed events and attributing movement to market forces.

News.Title: Zydus Wellness Reports Q2 Exceptional Costs of 342 Million Rupees from Acquisitions and Liquidation
News.Summary: Zydus Wellness reported exceptional costs of 342 million rupees in Q2 related to the acquisitions of Comfort Click Ltd and Naturell (India) Pvt Ltd, along with liquidation expenses. These one-time costs impact the company's quarterly financial results.

News.Title: Zydus Wellness Reports Q2 Net Loss of 528M Rupees Despite Revenue Growth
News.Summary: Zydus Wellness reported a net loss of 528 million rupees in Q2, compared to a profit of 209 million rupees in the same quarter last year. Revenue increased to 6.5 billion rupees from 4.93 billion rupees year-over-year. EBITDA rose to 230 million rupees from 196 million rupees, while EBITDA margin declined to 3.54% from 3.98% in the previous year.

News.Title: Zydus Wellness Subsidiary Receives Tax Notice of ₹563.3 Million
News.Summary: Zydus Wellness announced that one of its subsidiaries has received a tax notice amounting to ₹563.3 million rupees. The company disclosed this development regarding the tax matter affecting its subsidiary operations.

News.Title: Zydus Wellness Appoints Manish Lal as Head of Global Demand and Supply Organization
News.Summary: Zydus Wellness has appointed Manish Lal as Head of Global Demand and Supply Organization. Lal brings over 25 years of supply chain experience to the role.
